title.rendered: Why are GMCI’s Cosmetic Raw Materials High in Quality?

content.rendered:
GMCI’s aim is to turn mineral resources into high performance solutions. It produces some of the most essential cosmetic raw materials which have a huge demand due to their exceptional quality. Now, what makes GMCI’s cosmetic raw materials stand out? Let’s find out.

TALC: GMCI’s talc is oleophilic in nature i.e. it has a natural affinity with oil rather than water. It acts as a filler and a gripping absorbent that makes the facial makeup translucent and opaque. This helps the skin feel soft, cool and dry. The texture of the mineral is so silky and fine that it makes the application simple and easy. At the same time, it prevents skin breakouts and caking too.

KAOLIN: GMCI’s kaolin is well-suited for sensitive and dry skin. Its non-abrasive property helps to tone the skin. It is anti-inflammatory and relieves your skin from rashes and irritation. It helps in avoiding clogged pores and acts as a facial cleanser and exfoliator. The mineral’s naturally fine particles help in preventing frequent skin breakouts. GMCI’s kaolin is without fail your go-to detoxifier.

CALCIUM CARBONATE: GMCI produces a natural, white and pure calcium carbonate. Its exceptional absorbent property leaves you with a bright and glossy look. In addition to that, it has a gentle, soft and velvety touch to it. This mineral has multiple uses. It acts as a cleaning agent in toothpastes and body scrubs, opacifying and a whitening agent in eye shadow, face powder and lipstick as well as serves as a pigment extender and prolonger. It is very effective in bath products like bath salts and soap.

MICA: GMCI’s organic mica transmits and reflects light, thus providing a glowing effect resulting in radiant skin. It is suitable for all skin types with no side effects. It has anti-inflammatory properties that allows the skin to breathe and at the same time protects it against the environment. It is water resistant and therefore binds to oils rather than to water, altogether making it better for the skin. It also protects the skin against sun damage and doesn’t cause skin breakouts. It causes no discomfort and leaves you with a sparkly and shimmery look. Moreover, it is easy to clean off after use and therefore helps in avoiding clogged pores.

BENTONITE: GMCI’s bentonite acts as a natural barrier between the skin and the environment. It’s viscous and water-resistant nature helps in treating rashes and acne. It acts as a detoxifier and helps in improving the quality of the skin by removing toxic impurities. It removes blemishes and evenly tones the skin.

With such significant properties and applications, GMCI continues to lead in this sector. Chemicals might give you results immediately but that is short-lived. Organic and natural is what makes GMCI unique. Here at GMCI, we strive to achieve solutions that have a deep as well as a long-lasting impact.
